member.name: M:Chromely.Core.ChromelyApp.EnsureExpectedWorkingDirectory
member.summary: Using local resource handling requires files to be relative to the Expected working directory For example, if the app is launched via the taskbar the working directory gets changed to C:\Windows\system32 This needs to be changed to the right one.
